Name: Maximize Velocity
Description: Increase average story‐points completed per sprint

Name: Minimize Defect Rate
Description: Reduce number of defects per release

Name: Maximize Customer Feedback
Description: Increase number of feedback sessions per release

Name: Maximize ROI
Description: Increase return on investment for each project cycle

Name: Minimize Time‐to‐Market
Description: Shorten duration from project start to first release

Name: Minimize Budget Variance
Description: Keep actual spend within budget targets

Name: Maximize Code Coverage
Description: Raise test coverage percentage at sprint end

Name: Maximize Release Predictability
Description: Increase percentage of releases delivered on schedule
